abstract: Columbus, Ohio, police say man who attempted to buy airline ticket using false identification was fatally shot after lunging at airport police officer with a knife.
lead_paragraph: A man who tried to buy an airline ticket using fake identification was fatally shot Wednesday after lunging at an airport police officer with a knife, Columbus police said.
snippet: A man who tried to buy an airline ticket using fake identification was fatally shot Wednesday after lunging at an airport police officer with a knife, Columbus police said.

headline.main: Ohio: Police Shoot Man at Airport
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Police Shoot Man at Airport
